allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: use unicode-safe string slicing for body previews

Truncating strings with .slice\(0, 200\) can cut multi-byte Unicode
characters \(emojis\) in half, creating invalid UTF-8 that libSQL
rejects with HTTP 400. Use Array spread to iterate by code point.

Also adds batch chunking \(25 rows\) for large insert operations.
EOF
\)")
